lead_paragraph: With the lure of Champions League football proving too strong to resist, United States forward Alex Morgan is joining European champion Lyon in a move she hopes will help her become the world's best player.

headline.print_headline: US Forward Morgan Joins Lyon to Further Dream of Being No. 1
headline.main: US Forward Morgan Joins Lyon to Further Dream of Being No. 1
